name: Ramses' Quest
description:
This was a game project built for HackNC's 2018 Hackathon. See more info here: https://devpost.com/software/ramses-quest

This is a game starting Ramses The Ram, a blue colored Ram that's a parody of the University of North Carolina's mascot. Created using the Pico-8 Virtual Machine and Inspired by Arcade Gameplay and Atari Graphics, play through levels that will test you against your reactions and wit, racing against the clock. Collect as many points as you can, and race to the finish! 

Supports native MacOS, Windows, and Linux alongside an HTML for browsers.

(Later patches will add content such as music)
